comment.body: Looks like there are more internal dependencies to be removed in this file too.

comment.body: There are also various uses of PROV_LIBCTX_OF in the oqs_kmgmt.c file which are now not going to work properly because you are no longer allocating a provctx at all. It is fine not to allocate one, but if so then you need to remove all the `PROV_LIBCTX_OF`. Does the oqs_key need a libctx or not?

comment.body: Embarassing that I didn't go through everything first. Thanks for the diligence! To answer your question: Right now, we don't; but thinking about the not-too-distant future, we will need it (e.g., for implementing hybrids using EVP layer commands), so I'll go about adding "our own" CTX structure.
